permissions: User can unsubmit a time sheet if they are allowed to create a time sheet submission for that time sheet (admin, or the time sheet subject’s authorized user such as the driver/laborer, a manager member of the trucker, a member of the broker, or a job production plan time card approver, depending on subject type).
side_effects: Creates a time sheet unsubmission action and changes the time sheet status from submitted to editing; clears submitted_terms on the time sheet.
validation_notes: --time-sheet is required. The referenced time sheet must exist and be in submitted status. The time sheet is validated during the action (with overlap and duration validation skipped).
